title: x/tools/cmd/present: poor experience on Android Chrome
body:
by **bgarcia@golang.org**: 
When trying to view a "present" slide deck (e.g.
http://talks.golang.org/2014/c2go.slide), chrome on android attempts to do some
auto-resizing so that three slides are all completely viewable.  This makes the slides
very small, and puts a large blank area below the slides.

If I attempt to resize the page (via the two-finger resize gesture), I can attempt to
fix this.  But eventually, while swiping the slides left or right, I'll hit the
beginning or end of the deck, and either the slide will be resized, or the current slide
will be partially off-screen.
